tossup_question: -   –  Ozone is an allotrope of oxygen with formula O3. What is both the hybridization and molecular geometry of the central oxygen atom in ozone?
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three organic functional groups that, when substituted for a hydrogen on a benzene ring, would further activate that ring towards electrophilic substitution: 1) Amine; 2) Methyl; 3) Nitro.
